info.name: Folder Cast
info.summary: Turn your folders into podcast feeds.
info.description:
FolderCast is a lightweight Nextcloud application designed to generate podcast RSS feeds directly from your file directories. It parses ID3 tags, handles recursive scanning, and provides a simple way to listen to your personal audio.
